definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: Can you turn the declarative sentence into a rhetorical question?
sentences.chinese: 你能把這個陳述句改成反問句嗎？

sentences.english: The voice often falls at the end of a statement.
sentences.chinese: 在陳述句的句尾，發音通常降低。

sentences.english: This is a question, but it comes in the declarative form, too.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個問句，不過是以陳述句的形式出現的。

sentences.english: In an affirmative statement with one verb, the direct object pronoun comes immediately before the conjugated verb.
sentences.chinese: 在陳述句中，直接賓語在變過位的動詞前面。

sentences.english: It's crucial to keep repeating your mission statement throughout the attempt.
sentences.chinese: 在整個過程中重複任務陳述句很重要。

sentences.english: Distinguishing the difference between a statement, exclamation, and question.
sentences.chinese: 區分陳述句，感嘆句和疑問句的不同。

sentences.english: Using knowledge of types of sentences to discriminate between statements, exclamations, and questions.
sentences.chinese: 運用句子類型的知識區別陳述句，感嘆句和疑問句。

sentences.english: Similarly, questions can be formed from statements.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，凝問名可以由陳述句變成。
其實它是一句陳述句，對嗎？

sentences.english: Each statement tells us about one thing.
sentences.chinese: 每個陳述句告訴我們一件事情。

sentences.english: Ross is a girl of the period.
sentences.chinese: 陳述句的末尾應該有一句號。

definition: overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to get straight to the point (idiom)
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: to have a high notion of one's duty/to be highly principled
partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
